publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7 Margo MacDonald: Trams for Edinburgh—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive, together with the City of Edinburgh Council, to expedite the introduction of a trams system for Scotland’s capital immediately on taking office.
S3M-7 Trams for Edinburgh (lodged on 14 May 2007) Malcolm Chisholm*
S3M-7 Trams for Edinburgh (lodged on 14 May 2007) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-7 Trams for Edinburgh (lodged on 14 May 2007) George Foulkes*, Iain Gray*

S3M-7 Margo MacDonald: Trams for Edinburgh—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive, together with the City of Edinburgh Council, to expedite the introduction of a trams system for Scotland’s capital immediately on taking office. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm, Sarah Boyack, George Foulkes, Iain Gray
S3M-7 Trams for Edinburgh (lodged on 14 May 2007) Tavish Scott*
S3M-7 Trams for Edinburgh (lodged on 14 May 2007) Robin Harper*
